column4: I need to install an (old) piece of software for University that depends on glib1.2. Of course, libglib1.2-dev is not in the default packages for Ubuntu 10. How can I install libglib1.2-dev?
I think if you add an old repo it will become available to you...
I'd like to avoid installing from source where possible... okay, how do I add an old repo?
neverminded, figured it out all on my lonesome
